text: (nabiyē! edinadī) malāyikāvarun tamangē deviyanṭa praśaṁsā kara suviśuddha karamin, arṣ vaṭā vaṭa karagena siṭinu oba dakinnehiya. ē atara ovun atarē sādhāraṇa lesaṭama viniścaya karanu læbē. “lōkavāsīn siyallanvama utpādanaya kara, pōṣaṇaya kara, saṁrakṣaṇaya karamin siṭina allāhṭama siyalū praśaṁsā ayat vē” yayi (siyallan visin suviśuddha kara, praśaṁsā kara) pavasanu læbē
